title: Credit Acceptance Named One of Metro Detroit's 101 Best and Brightest Companies to Work For
text:
Credit Acceptance Named One of Metro Detroit's 101 Best and Brightest Companies to Work For July 31, 2015 16:05 ET | Source:   Southfield, Michigan, July 31, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --   (NASDAQ: CACC) (referred to as the "Company", "Credit Acceptance", "we", "our", or "us") has been recognized as one of Metro Detroit's 101 Best and Brightest Companies to Work For ® . The Best and Brightest Companies to Work For ® award identifies and honors companies that demonstrate a commitment to excellence in their human resource practices and employee enrichment. Organizations are assessed based on categories such as communication, work-life balance, employee education, diversity, recognition, retention and more. "This announcement marks the fourth straight year that we have received this prestigious honor. Thank you to those team members who participated in the survey process and to everyone for your continued efforts to make Credit Acceptance a great place to work," said Brett Roberts, CEO. 
To see the complete 2015 List of Metro Detroit's 101 Best and Brightest Companies to Work For ® , visit 101bestandbrightest.com. About Credit Acceptance Since   creditacceptance.com . Investor Relations: Douglas W. Busk Senior Vice President and Treasurer 248) 353-2700 Ext. 4432 Related Articles
